description:
Ichigo, Renji, Rukia, and Izuru collapse after being exposed to Konjiki Ashisogijizo`s poison. Konjiki Ashisogijizo then seeks for its next prey but is stopped by Yachiru Kusajishi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Byakuya o Oe! Konran no Gotei Tai
Il faut poursuivre Byakuya ! Confusion dans le Gotei 13
Pursue Byakuya! The Confused Gotei Divisions
白哉を追え! 混乱の護廷隊
